params.proposalRef: Reference used when the action was proposed

params.communityId: Community ID to grant founder privileges for

params.id: ID of the valuable action to deactivate

returns.ids: Array of active valuable action IDs

returns._0: Whether the valuable action is active

params.communityId: Community ID this action belongs to
params.proposalRef: Arbitrary governance reference that ties creation and activation

returns.valuableActionId: The ID of the created valuable action

params.status: Whether the address should be a moderator
params.who: Address to set moderator status for

params.id: ID of the valuable action to update
params.params: New configuration for the valuable action

activateFromGovernance(uint256,bytes32).notice: Activate valuable action after governance approval

addFounder(address,uint256).notice: Add founder to whitelist for community bootstrap

communityByActionId(uint256).notice: Mapping from valuable action ID to communityId

communityRegistry().notice: CommunityRegistry for resolving per-community module addresses

deactivate(uint256).notice: Deactivate a valuable action (cannot be used for new claims)

getActiveValuableActions().notice: Get all active valuable action IDs

governance().notice: Address that can manage moderators (typically governance)

isActive(uint256).notice: Mapping to track active/inactive valuable actions

isModerator(address).notice: Mapping from address to moderator status

isValuableActionActive(uint256).notice: Check if a valuable action exists and is active

pendingValuableActions(uint256).notice: Mapping to track pending valuable actions awaiting governance activation (by proposal ref)

proposalRefUsed(bytes32).notice: Track proposal refs already used to prevent reuse

proposeValuableAction(uint256,(uint32,ui.notice: Propose a new valuable action (must be executed via governance/Timelock)

setModerator(address,bool).notice: Set moderator status for an address

valuableActionsById(uint256).notice: Mapping from valuable action ID to configuration
